website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers GOwalk 4 - Convertible became a comfortable walking companion for many buyers. Its drop-heel construction was highly appreciated by people with various foot conditions.
pros: A vast majority of purchasers marveled at the comfort that the Skechers GOwalk 4 - Convertible provided for daily walks, traveling, and casual wear
Many users loved the drop-heel style of the shoe
the option of folding the back down accommodated people with heel issues
The product had a lightweight and soft nature, according to some people
It was also deemed durable by several wearers
cons: One user wished for a bit more cushioning in the footbed

customer_reviews.title: Quality declined
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my third pair of these for work. I usually like them, though they only last around 4 months before the foam wears down. However, this time my feet hurt worse than when I wore the pair before. I compared the memory foam on my old to new, and the new is thinner! No wonder my feet hurt worse! I won’t be buying Skechers anymore and they were always my go to brand for standing 8 hours at work. The search is on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I still have my first pair as well. They are as comfortable as slippers, but provide enough support for working several hours on your feet. The great part is you can wear them as a full shoe, or slip-ons, since the backs fold in if you want to wear them as more of a slipper or mule. They also wash beautifully in the machine. Just remember you need to air dry after washing. Do not put them in the dryer. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like them so much, bought another pair for a friend
customer_reviews.text: ... who likes them as much as I do. This wasn't my first pair. I've worn out several in the last few years. Sturdy enough for everyday wear, and comfortable enough too. Also very easy to clean. Cant beat that combo!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They didn't have my size so I went up a half size, still fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect all day comfort
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect as an all-day-on-my-feet work shoe. Only issue is it's just a touch loose.
customer_reviews.author: Gospezillio

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. This is the 3rd pair of these that I'm buying. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Orea

customer_reviews.title: Best of skechers. Please produce this again!
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of skechers. Among them this is the best. I have tried several gowalk5 but none of them was more comfortable than this, especially the back of the ankle part which is made of soft leather. This is genius. I bought orange color long time ago and i just bought black now. I hope skechers make this product again. I want to have more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I am glad I got them plus the price was fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Molly E. McCorquodale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this version of Skechers for a while. My favorite edition. I love the shape of the shoe, very simple and cool design. I have purchased 4 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Zivile Holder

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Color was pretty, fit smaller than expected, bought for high arch support- didn’t feel supported, very light weight but felt like they wouldn’t hold up. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Fit and color as described
customer_reviews.text: The color was accurate to the picture and the fit is great!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Whipple
